title: Bug 14113 should listen to FSOURCEATTACHED and FSOURCEDETACHED Java deltas
description: Currently, when one changes the attached source of a jar, a FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH Java delta is fired, which is incorrect. As a result, the UI reacts by closing the class file editors opened on this jar, which is intended behavior for a FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH Java delta. However, when I tried to fix the delta to be a (FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED) delta, the UI did not respond.
SR: When changing the attached source of a jar, a FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH Java delta is incorrectly fired. This causes the UI to close the class file editors for the jar, which is not the intended behavior. The delta should be fixed to be a (FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED) delta, but the UI does not respond to this change.
